data.title: Convert Macau Patacas (MOP) and Nepalese Rupees (NPR): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in Macau Pataca (MOP) to and from Nepalese Rupee (NPR) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This Macau Pataca and Nepalese Rupee convertor is up to date with exchange rates from August 18, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of Macau Pataca. Use "Swap currencies" to make Nepalese Rupee the default currency. Click on Nepalese Rupees or Macau Patacas to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

The Macau Pataca is the currency in Macau (MO, MAC). The Nepalese Rupee is the currency in Nepal (NP, NPL). The symbol for MOP can be written P. The symbol for NPR can be written NRs. The Macau Pataca is divided into 100 avos. The Nepalese Rupee is divided into 100 paise. The exchange rate for the Macau Pataca was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The exchange rate for the Nepalese Rupee was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The MOP conversion factor has 4 significant digits. The NPR conversion factor has 5 significant digits.
